description.ko: 식물적 생명력과 컴퓨터 하드웨어의 섬세한 융합으로, 디지털 세계에서 영원히 피어나는 봄을 표현합니다.
description.en: A delicate fusion of botanical life and computer hardware, representing a spring that blooms forever in a digital world.

prompt: A mechanical monarch butterfly with wings made of iridescent #89CFF0 fractal geometry, landing on a digital lotus with #FFB6C1 binary-coded petals. The scene depicts nature reclaiming an abandoned #4A0E4E silicon valley with #50C878 mossy circuitry. 8k, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage, cinematic lighting, and a soft bokeh background that emphasizes the delicate intersection of organic spring and rigid technology.
